column4: Im a web developer, i develope since  9 years ago on windows and im trying to migrate to ubuntu, there is on windows, on notepad++ a feature that i absolute need. when im over a word, all the words like that get shadow, you can see an example here: http://dl.getdropbox.com/u/351031/sombrea.png
couldnt read it real well but i only use vim it will do things like that
but vim has a steep learning curve
